name: Zeichnet Kriegsanleihe! LCCN2004666201 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Zeichnet Kriegsanleihe! Abstract: Poster shows a farmer and his wife(?) plowing. A soldier standing next to the farmer motions toward other soldiers in the distance. Text: Subscribe to the War Loan! Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 38 x 49 cm. Notes: R. Lendl.; Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Title from item.
